title: DTH share of TV market in India 2023
summary: The chart shows the DTH share TV , expressed in percent three different countries .
The Share_of_digital_TV_market and Share_of_pay_TV_market have similar DTH share gaps at around 20 % whilst Share_of_digital_TV_market is doing a little better at 39 % .
gold: The statistics presents a forecast on the market share of direct-to-home ( DTH ) TV in India in 2023 . The source projects that the market share of DTH on the pay TV market amounted to 39 percent .
